Title: Boeing To Take Charges On KC-46 Tanker Over Quality Issue -finance Chief
Description: Boeing Co. will take additional charges to the KC-46 tanker program due to a supplier quality issue with the center fuel tank, the company's finance chief said Wednesday.

Title: 2023 Layoff Tracker: Indeed Cuts 2,200 Employees
Description: Amazon, Alphabet, Meta, Salesforce and Disney have all slashed staff this year, citing cloudy economic forecasts.

Title: Skift India Daily: India’s Airlines Projected to Report Nearly $2 Billion in Losses
Description: Indian airlines are expected to report a consolidated loss of $1.6 to 1.8 billion in the financial year 2023-24, according to CAPA India.
